languages.text: И вот мы подступили к Машинному храму. Узрели мы огромную лифтовую шахту — след, оставленный огромным буровым прогрызателем тверди и уходивший на километры вглубь планеты. Где-то там, внизу, засели главари еретиков. Гранаты и обещания скорого правосудия летели в створ шахты сотнями — так велика была наша праведная ненависть.

At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.
languages.original_text: И вот мы подступили к Машинному храму. Узрели мы огромную лифтовую шахту — след, оставленный огромным буровым прогрызателем тверди и уходивший на километры вглубь планеты. Где-то там, внизу, засели главари еретиков. Гранаты и обещания скорого правосудия летели в створ шахты сотнями — так велика была наша праведная ненависть.

traits.locale_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lied the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades accompanied by promises of swift judgement were flying into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lied the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades accompanied by promises of swift judgement were flying into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lied the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lied the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lied the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lied the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

languages.text: 到最后，我们终于抵达了机械大教堂。在那里，我们看到了一枚巨大的钻头正在不断地啃噬着脚下的大地，留下了一座巨大的升降井，巨大的深洞达数公里之深。而在升降井的深处，便是异端分子首领最后的藏身之处。我们朝深坑投下了几百枚手雷，发誓一定要让那些异端分子接受惩罚。这就是我们正义的怒火。
languages.original_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: 到最后，我们终于抵达了机械大教堂。在那里，我们看到了一枚巨大的钻头正在不断地啃噬着脚下的大地，留下了一座巨大的升降井，巨大的深洞达数公里之深。而在升降井的深处，便是异端分子首领最后的藏身之处。我们朝深坑投下了几百枚手雷，发誓一定要让那些异端分子接受惩罚。这就是我们正义的怒火。

languages.text: Nous avons enfin fini par atteindre la Cathédrale de la Machine. Derrière une gigantesque foreuse qui avait creusé à des kilomètres dans les profondeurs de la planète, un puits d'ascenseur béant n'attendait plus que nous. Là, tout au fond, se cachait l'ultime repaire des chefs hérétiques. Mus par notre juste colère, nous avons lancé des centaines de grenades dans cette fosse, promettant à ses occupants un châtiment expéditif.
languages.original_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: Nous avons enfin fini par atteindre la Cathédrale de la Machine. Derrière une gigantesque foreuse qui avait creusé à des kilomètres dans les profondeurs de la planète, un puits d'ascenseur béant n'attendait plus que nous. Là, tout au fond, se cachait l'ultime repaire des chefs hérétiques. Mus par notre juste colère, nous avons lancé des centaines de grenades dans cette fosse, promettant à ses occupants un châtiment expéditif.

languages.text: ついに機会大聖堂に到着した。我々が目にしたのは、この惑星の深部に何キロも潜り込んだ、巨大な陸地掘削用ドリルが残した巨大なリフトシャフトだった。その地下深くに異端者の指導者どもの最後の隠れ家があった。何百発もの手榴弾が、迅速な裁きの約束とともに穴に投げ込まれた――それが我々の正義の怒りだった。
languages.original_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: ついに機会大聖堂に到着した。我々が目にしたのは、この惑星の深部に何キロも潜り込んだ、巨大な陸地掘削用ドリルが残した巨大なリフトシャフトだった。その地下深くに異端者の指導者どもの最後の隠れ家があった。何百発もの手榴弾が、迅速な裁きの約束とともに穴に投げ込まれた――それが我々の正義の怒りだった。

languages.text: Por fin llegamos a la Catedral Máquina. Vimos la galería de un ascensor formada por el paso de un taladro que había horadado el planeta hasta una profundidad de varios kilómetros. Ahí, en las profundidades, estaba el último escondite de los líderes herejes. Arrojamos cientos de granadas y aún más promesas de un juicio inminente al pozo, motivados por la cólera justiciera.
languages.original_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

traits.locale_text: Por fin llegamos a la Catedral Máquina. Vimos la galería de un ascensor formada por el paso de un taladro que había horadado el planeta hasta una profundidad de varios kilómetros. Ahí, en las profundidades, estaba el último escondite de los líderes herejes. Arrojamos cientos de granadas y aún más promesas de un juicio inminente al pozo, motivados por la cólera justiciera.

languages.text: Endlich erreichten wir die Maschinenkathedrale. Wir sahen einen gähnenden Aufzugsschacht, von einem kolossalen landfressenden Bohrer stammend, der sich kilometertief in den Planeten gegraben hatte. Dort, tief unten, lag das letzte Versteck der Anführer der Ketzer. So groß war unser rechtschaffener Zorn, dass hunderte von Granaten in das Loch geschleudert wurden, begleitet von dem Versprechen eines schnellen Urteils.
languages.original_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.

So groß war unser rechtschaffener Zorn, dass hunderte von Granaten in das Loch geschleudert wurden, begleitet von dem Versprechen eines schnellen Urteils.

Endlich erreichten wir die Maschinenkathedrale. Wir sahen einen gähnenden Aufzugsschacht, von einem kolossalen landfressenden Bohrer stammend, der sich kilometertief in den Planeten gegraben hatte. Dort, tief unten, lag das letzte Versteck der Anführer der Ketzer. So groß war unser rechtschaffener Zorn, dass hunderte von Granaten in das Loch geschleudert wurden, begleitet von dem Versprechen eines schnellen Urteils.

languages.text: Sonunda Makine Katedrali'ne ulaştık. Gezegenin derinliklerine doğru kilometrelerce kazı yapıp toprak aşındıran, devasa matkabın bıraktığı dipsiz asansör boşluğunu gördük. Tam orada, o dipsiz oyukta kâfirlerin liderlerinin son sığınağı bulunuyordu. Yıldırım hızındaki bir hesaplaşma vaadi eşliğinde, yüzlerce bombanın yanı sıra faziletli hiddetimizi de o çukura yağdırdık.
languages.original_text: At last, we reached the Machine Cathedral. We saw a yawning lift shaft left behind by a colossal land-gnawing drill that had burrowed for kilometres into the depths of the planet. There, deep below, lay the last hiding place of the heretics' leaders. Hundreds of grenades, accompanied by promises of swift judgement, were hurled into the pit — such was our righteous anger.
